name: Stress, Out!
description:
Introducing "Stress, Out!" - a thrilling top-down gore shooter that offers you the ultimate outlet to release your pent-up stress. Engage in a heart-pounding adventure as you unleash your arsenal of special abilities to obliterate hordes of enemies in a visceral display of power and destruction.

In "Stress, Out!", you find yourself immersed in a chaotic world where stress and tension run rampant. However, you hold the key to liberation as you navigate through intense and meticulously designed levels, ready to unleash your fury upon any adversary that dares to stand in your way.

Unleash your inner warrior as you harness a variety of unique special abilities, each tailored to decimate your enemies in the most satisfying ways imaginable. Whether it's summoning devastating storms, unleashing explosive bursts of energy, or manipulating the environment to your advantage, the power is in your hands to demolish everything that stands between you and tranquility.

But be warned, as you progress, the challenges become more ferocious and unforgiving. Stay vigilant and hone your skills, for only the truly determined can conquer the increasingly formidable opposition that awaits.
